screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .mdp file in MediBang Paint Pro 21
screenshot.caption: MDP file open in MediBang Paint Pro 21

description: The MDP file is the primary file type associated with MediBang Paint Pro. The format is only supported by MediBang Paint Pro, but can be exported to more popular formats, such as .PNG , .JPG , .BMP , .TIFF , .WEBP , and .PSD .

You can create an MDP file in MediBang Paint Pro by selecting File → New... then selecting File → Save or Save As... and selecting the "MediBang Paint Pro" format. You can open an MDP file in MediBang Paint Pro by selecting File → Open... and choosing the MDP file.

images.caption: MDP file open in MediBang Paint Pro 21
